## UNICEF ggplot theme settings
unicef_theme <- theme_bw() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 16, colour = unicef_darkblue),

legend.format <- function (prefix = "", 
                           suffix = "", 
                           between = " &ndash; ", 
                           digits = 3, 
                           big.mark = ",", 
                           transform = identity) {
  formatNum <- function(x) {
    format(round(transform(x), digits), trim = TRUE, 
           scientific = FALSE, big.mark = big.mark)
  }
    function(type, ...) {
        switch(type, numeric = (function(cuts) {
            paste0(prefix, formatNum(cuts), suffix)
        })(...), bin = (function(cuts) {
            n = length(cuts)
            paste0(prefix, formatNum(cuts[-n]), between, formatNum(cuts[-1]), 
                suffix)
        })(...), quantile = (function(cuts, p) {
            n = length(cuts)
            p = paste0(round(p * 100), "%")
            cuts = paste0(formatNum(cuts[-n]), between, formatNum(cuts[-1]), suffix)
        })(...), factor = (function(cuts) {
            paste0(prefix, as.character(transform(cuts)), suffix)
        })(...))
    }
}

selectInput(inputId = "year_end",
            label = "To",
            selected = max(unique(lubridate::year(topics$Posted))),
            choices = rev(unique(lubridate::year(topics$Posted))))

selectInput(inputId = "scale_options",
            label = "Scale options",
            selected = "fixed",
            choices = c("fixed", "free", "free_x", "free_y"))

### Monthly

```{r monthlies}
output$monthly_topics <- renderPlotly({
  req(input$themes_options)
  
  time_period <- input$year_start:input$year_end
  
  z <- topics %>%
    filter(Theme %in% input$themes_options,
           lubridate::year(Posted) %in% time_period) %>%
    count_topics(by_date = "month_year") %>%
    mutate(`Month Year` = paste(Month, Year, sep = " "),
           `Month Year` = lubridate::my(`Month Year`)) %>%
    ggplot(mapping = aes(x = `Month Year`, y = n)) +
    geom_col(fill = unicef_blue, colour = unicef_blue, alpha = 0.7) +
    scale_x_date(name = "", date_breaks = "3 months", date_labels = "%b %Y") +
    labs(title = "Number of questions posted per month by theme",
         y = "No. of questions posted") +
    facet_wrap(. ~ Theme, ncol = 1, scales = input$scale_options) +
    unicef_theme +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8, angle = 90),
          axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8))

  ggplotly(p = z)
})

plotlyOutput(outputId = "monthly_topics")
```

### Yearly

```{r yearlies}
output$yearly_topics <- renderPlotly({
  req(input$themes_options)
  
  z <- topics %>%
    filter(Theme %in% input$themes_options) %>%
    count_topics(by_date = "year") %>%
    ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Year, y = n)) +
    geom_col(fill = unicef_blue, colour = unicef_blue, alpha = 0.7) +
    scale_x_continuous(name = "", breaks = rev(unique(lubridate::year(topics$Posted)))) +
    labs(title = "Number of questions posted per year by theme",
         y = "No. of questions posted") +
    facet_wrap(. ~ Theme, ncol = 1, scales = input$scale_options) +
    unicef_theme +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8, angle = 90),
          axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8))
  
  ggplotly(p = z)
})

plotlyOutput(outputId = "yearly_topics")
```
